data.title: freebayes
data.description: Bayesian haplotype-based genetic polymorphism discovery and genotyping.
data.name: freebayes

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "freebayes is provided as a pre-built 64-bit static Linux binary as part of [releases](https://github.com/freebayes/freebayes/releases)."
"freebayes is maintained by Erik Garrison and Pjotr Prins." (indicates an open-source project with named maintainers under the org account `freebayes`)

"freebayes is provided as a pre-built 64-bit static Linux binary as part of releases." and extensive command-line examples like `freebayes -f ref.fa aln.bam >var.vcf` show it is an end-user program for variant calling, not a library.
